  - `in` í‚¤ì›Œë“œë¡œ type narrowing ê°•í™”
  - `satisfies` â­ï¸
    - ```ts
      type RGB = [red: number, green: number, blue: number];

      const palette = {
          red: [255, 0, 0],
          green: "#00ff00",
          blue: [0, 0]
          //    ~~~~~~ error!
      } satisfies Record<string, string | RGB>;

      // Information about each property is still maintained.
      const redComponent = palette.red.at(0);
      const greenNormalized = palette.green.toUpperCase();
      ```

  - pending ìƒíƒœì— ëŒ€í•œ effect í›…ì´ ì‚¬ë¼ì§€ê³ ~ ì¢€ ë” ê°€ë…ì„± ì¢‹ì•„ì§€ëŠ” ê²ƒ ê°™ë‹¤.
    ```js
    function Note({id}) {
      // This fetches a note asynchronously, but to the component author it looks
      // like a synchronous operation.
      const note = use(fetchNote(id));
      return (
        <div>
          <h1>{note.title}</h1>
          <section>{note.body}</section>
        </div>
      );
    }
    ```
